name: Snake Using Windows
description:
This is a game made out of multiple app windows. What that means is that the game makes multiple copies of itself and moves/stretches these app windows to make Snake!

This was made for Ludum Dare 49.

The theme of the jam was "Unstable" , so I decided to make a program that was itself unstable.

IMPORTANT

Press escape to close the program.

If you click off the window, click on the white and black blinking window to regain control.

If the program crashes, delete info.txt and all the programs SHOULD close.

You should also make sure the info.txt doesn't exist before running the program.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move

Hold Spacebar for a burst of speed
